name: XT-2 Xtortion
details:
The XT-2 is a love or hate type of distortion pedal. It’s got a very hard edged distortion that sounds a bit different from other Boss distortion pedals. The tone controls are called Countour and Punch and is not just a renaming of bass and treble. Contour cuts highs or boosts highs and lows while Punch controls the distortion depth and adds a mid boost. Anyone tired of the convenional distortion sounds might like the XT-2.
Pedal production started July 1996 and was released together with the PW-2 soon afterwards. Production ended 11 months later with less than 20 000 pedals made.
Specifications
Controls: Level, Contour, Punch, Distortion
Connectors: Input, Output, AC Adaptor
Current Draw: 15 mA (DC 9V)
Recommended AC Adaptor: PSA Series
Labels
Silver – Made In Taiwan
The XT-2 was sold from August 1996 to December 1998.
http://www.bossarea.com/boss-xt-2-xtortion/
